# Work Packages {.unnumbered}

To streamline navigation of this site, the requirements for each work package (WP) have been collected here, on a single page.

::: callout-tip
Each subsection corresponds to one of the 6 WPs within the VALIDATE project. The relevant links listed below direct the user to the requirement pages (e.g., [1 Human Agency and Oversight (HUM)](1_hum.qmd). Thus, users from specific work packages can easily navigate the requirements which are assigned to them.
:::
